REQUESTED.title: Session Requested for:
REQUESTED.moreInfo: You will be notified via email as soon as your request has a response

REJECTED.title: Session Unavailable:
REJECTED.moreInfo: This session is no longer available. Please request another one.

modal.title: Are you sure?
modal.disclaimer:
Request the session only if you defininitely can attend.
Mitein is a charity and free service. Cancellations make our life tough.
Therefore, we only allow one cancellation per user once a session is booked.

REJECTED.title: Session Declined:
REJECTED.moreInfo: You declined this session. It is now no longer scheduled or available

modal.title: Are you sure?
modal.disclaimer:
Click confirm only if you defininitely can attend.
Mitein is a charity and free service. Cancellations make our life tough.
Therefore, we only allow one cancellation per user.
